description: This vegan take on a classic recipe is filled with peanut butter, chocolate, powdered sugar, and crispy cereal!
keywords: chocolate covered cereal, puppy chow, vegan puppy chow
name: Vegan Puppy Chow
recipeIngredient: 7 cups of a chex-like cereal (choose rice or corn to make it gluten-free)

recipeInstructions.text: Microwave the chocolate chips, peanut butter, and vegan butter all together in one bowl (microwave for 30 sec increments until it is completely combined and smooth). Stir in the vanilla extract.
Put the cereal in a separate bowl.
Pour the chocolate-peanut butter mixture over the cereal and mix.
Separate the cereal into two separate gallon re-sealable bags.
Start with 1/3 cup of powdered sugar in each bag and shake (if not white yet, keep adding sugar until desired appearance).

video.description: An easy to make chocolate and peanut butter vegan puppy chow. It's perfect for an after school treat, game day recipe, or a special dessert.
video.name: Vegan Puppy Chow
